verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H0480"\w* is me! for I am as when they have \w gathered|strong="H0625"\w* the summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w*, as the \w grapegleanings|strong="H5955"\w* of the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w*: \add there is\add* no \w cluster|strong="H0811"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* the firstripe \w fruit|strong="H1063"\w*.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft when…: Heb. the gatherings of summer\f*

The \w good|strong="H2623"\w* \add man\add* is \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and \add there is\add* none \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* among \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: they all lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; they \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* with a \w net|strong="H2764"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft good: or, godly, or, merciful\f*

¶ That they may do \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* with both \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H3190"\w*, the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* \w asketh|strong="H7592"\w*, and the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \add asketh\add* for a \w reward|strong="H7966"\w*; and the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add man\add*, he \w uttereth|strong="H1696"\w* his \w mischievous|strong="H1942"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w*: so they wrap it \w up|strong="H5686"\w*.\f + \fr 7.3 \ft his…: Heb. the mischief of his soul\f*

The \w best|strong="H2896"\w* of them \add is\add* as a \w brier|strong="H2312"\w*: the most \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \add is sharper\add* than a thorn \w hedge|strong="H4534"\w*: the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \add and\add* thy \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*; now shall be their \w perplexity|strong="H3998"\w*.

¶ \w Trust|strong="H0539"\w* ye not in a \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, put ye not \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* in a \w guide|strong="H0441"\w*: \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* from her that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* in thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

For the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w dishonoureth|strong="H5034"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* riseth \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against her \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, the daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w* against her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w*; a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \add are\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Therefore I will \w look|strong="H6822"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; I will \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* for the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*: my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* me.

¶ \w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* not against me, O mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: when I \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, I shall \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*; when I \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add shall be\add* a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* unto me.

I will \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w indignation|strong="H2197"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against him, until he \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, and \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* for me: he will bring me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \add and\add* I shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

Then \add she that is\add* mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and \w shame|strong="H0955"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* her which \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Where is the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* her: now shall she be trodden \w down|strong="H4823"\w* as the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w* of the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.\f + \fr 7.10 \ft Then…: or, And thou wilt see her that is mine enemy, and cover her with shame\f*\f + \fr 7.10 \ft shall she…: Heb. she shall be for a treading down\f*

\add In\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thy \w walls|strong="H1447"\w* are to be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, \add in\add* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w decree|strong="H2706"\w* be far \w removed|strong="H7368"\w*.

\add In\add* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add also\add* he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* even to thee from \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \add from\add* the \w fortified|strong="H4693"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and from the \w fortress|strong="H4693"\w* even to the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, and from \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and \add from\add* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* to \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft and from the fortified cities: or, even to the fortified cities\f*

Notwithstanding the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* because of them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, for the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft Notwithstanding: or, After that it hath been\f*

¶ \w Feed|strong="H7462"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with thy \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of thine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*, which \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w solitarily|strong="H0910"\w* \add in\add* the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*: let them \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \add in\add* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* and \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft Feed: or, Rule\f*

According to the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* will I \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* unto him \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* \add things\add*.

¶ The \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* and be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* at all their \w might|strong="H1369"\w*: they shall \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \add their\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \add their\add* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* shall be \w deaf|strong="H2790"\w*.

They shall \w lick|strong="H3897"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* like a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*, they shall \w move|strong="H7264"\w* out of their \w holes|strong="H4526"\w* like \w worms|strong="H2119"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: they shall be \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* because of thee.\f + \fr 7.17 \ft worms: or, creeping things\f*

Who \add is\add* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* like unto thee, that \w pardoneth|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and passeth \w by|strong="H5674"\w* the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of his \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*? he \w retaineth|strong="H2388"\w* not his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*, because he \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \add in\add* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.

He will turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, he will have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* upon us; he will \w subdue|strong="H3533"\w* our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*; and thou wilt \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* all their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* into the \w depths|strong="H4688"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Thou wilt \w perform|strong="H5414"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \add and\add* the \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, which thou hast \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*.
